scripts.ci-check: npm run ci-lint && npm run typecheck && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace '@bitextual/web' && npm run build --workspace '@bitextual/cf'
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test --workspaces --if-present
scripts.serve: npm run build && npm run serve --workspace '@bitextual/cf'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy --workspace '@bitextual/cf'
